title: NO LONGER TAKING APPLICANTS
posting_body: ['NO LONGER TAKING APPLICANTS', "Sorry this has already received 100+ responses in only 24 hours, so I won't be accepting any more emails :(", 'Thanks all and good luck!!', '--', '1 Bedroom apartment available Sept 1st, 15th, or October 1st!', 'Hi all!', 'I am moving to a different state for work so I am looking to have someone take over my apartment.', "It's a cute little one bedroom that's not the size of a closet lol.", "A cleaning person comes every week to clean the building, and the neighbors I've met so far are all really nice/cool!", 'This would be for a LEASE TAKEOVER - you would be taking over the lease which goes until 7/1/2023.', "You'd have the option to re-sign as well.", 'Details!', '-1 bedroom 1 bath available in Bushwick', '-3rd Floor Walk Up', '-Laundry 3 blocks', '-1 Block from the J/M train, Halsey/Broadway', '-Bodega across the street', '-Grocery 1 block away (Key Foods)', '-Coffee 1 block away', '-Cats allowed', '-Heat and Hot Water included in rent', '-Utilities paid by tenant: Cooking gas, electric, internet', '-1 Closet in bedroom, 1 closet in living room', '-Gas stove and stainless steel appliances', '-NO BROKER FEE!', '(YAY)', '-The living room and kitchen get pretty good light so this apt is definitely plant friendly!', "-Apartment doesn't face the street so it's not very loud.", "You get the occasional neighbor outside playing music on the weekend, but that's BK for ya", 'This can be available for Sept 1st, Sept 15th, or October 1st move in.', 'For the lease takeover, the landlord will require 650+ credit score and 40x rent, guarantors accepted.', 'Please email me if interested!', "If the post is still up, it's available!", 'Thanks!']
